about_the_game:
Listen to STARDROP's original music created by Adam Halpin.

Track list:

  • 01-A Universe Of Solitude (3:21)
  • 02-STARDROP Main Theme Song (2:08)
  • 03-Prologue (1:25)
  • 04-Welcome To Stardocks (2:44)
  • 05-The tale of the SD-01 (2:25)
  • 06-Generator Core 02 (2:35)
  • 07-Hull Breach (0:44)
  • 08-Tension (3:23)
  • 09-Remember The Columbiad (2:54)
  • 10-Mainframe (3:18)
  • 11-Ido Remembers (1:33)
  • 12-The End (8:16)

All tracks are in high quality mp3 format

name: STARDROP - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.00 GHz / AMD CPU 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB (AMD Radeon HD 7970 or Nvidia GeForce 1060)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.00 GHz / AMD CPU 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB (AMD GPU: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GPU: Nvidia GeForce 1080)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Listen to STARDROP's original music by Adam Halpin
